data.text: -i want to say this season two,

data.text: Sylvester Stallone appears on "This Is Us."

data.text: -He does. -And you worked with him before.

data.text: But how cool is it to have Sylvester Stallone come on?

data.text: I mean, spending time on set with him, even when I was

data.text: 27 years old filming "Balboa," he´s such an incredible artist.

translation.text: 27 tuổi quay phim "Balboa", anh ấy là một nghệ sĩ đáng kinh ngạc.

data.text: But also on "Balboa," he wrote and directed and starred

data.text: years after that film, he´d always say to me,
